body:
This is working as intended.  Here is the reply I wrote one of the times this came up earlier: https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/SwmjC_j5q90/99rdN1LEN1kJ .

Note that the Go project doesn't use the issue tracker for discussion or questions.  If you want to discuss this further please see https://golang.org/wiki/Questions .  Thanks.
